name: Siege Defender (Prototype)
description:
(Warning: contains flashing lights)

A small tower defense game that a group of my peers and I made during a college game jam.

Defend your fort from a siege of goblins and orcs. You don't have any direct attacks - but what you can do is give tactical support by magically repairing turrets and barriers.

See how long you can hold off the onslaught before the monsters destroy your tower.

-------------------------------------------

Controls (full manual included in the game)

WASD: Movement

Space-bar: Heal surrounding walls/turrets

Left-click: Place barrier

Right-click: Place bomb

E: Open shop when close by

-------------------------------------------


This is the first version of this game. I may create updates in the future to fix errors and/or add new features. So far, this is just a prototype but I'd like to add levels and a larger fort.

Note: some of the assets used in this game are not owned or created by my team, but this is a non-profit product.
